OpenTCP examples

Detailed Description

These files offer some examples demonstrating basic structure and operation of applications using OpenTCP to achieve Internet connectivity.


Files

file  main_demo.c
 This file shows an example of main loop of an app using OpenTCP.

file  tcp_client_demo.c
 Demonstration of a possible scenario of writing TCP applications.

file  tcp_server_demo.c
 Demonstration of a possible scenario of writing TCP applications.

file  udp_demo.c
 Demonstration of a possible scenario of writing UDP application.
